reviewText: Very good movie. This is the second one that saw from the same "duo" , Mazzantini (writer) and Castellito (director). Even Nessuno si salva da solo is very good,  I believe that the previous one "Don't move" with Penelope Cruz and Castellito as actor and director, was better. Any way, I hardly recommend both. One note, there are no english subtitles in "Nessuno si salva...". The subtitles are only in italiano,  for the deaf people
